mdRecord.dcterms:title: War Time Correspondence to General Jms B. Floyd from W. W. McComas
mdRecord.dcterms:description: War time correspondence, June 4, 1861, to General Jms B. Floyd from W. W. McComas, subject: 8 or 10 thousand plus Lincoln's troops marching toward Va and Tenn R.R. - we have no arms - send help. 1 original piece. Note: this is actually in Thomas Shelor's handwriting so he copied the message to send.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
